--- alter_table_add_synonym.sql
ALTER TABLE Singers ADD SYNONYM SingersTest
--- AST
&ast.AlterTable{
  Alter: 0,
  Name:  &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 12,
    NameEnd: 19,
    Name:    "Singers",
  },
  TableAlteration: &ast.AddSynonym{
    Add:  20,
    Name: &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 32,
      NameEnd: 43,
      Name:    "SingersTest",
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
ALTER TABLE Singers ADD SYNONYM SingersTest
